pokeballs.name: Regular
pokeballs.description: Standard Pok√© Ball used to catch Pok√©mon.

pokeballs.name: Repeat
pokeballs.description: More effective against Pok√©mon species that the player has already caught.

pokeballs.name: Nest
pokeballs.description: More effective against lower-level wild Pok√©mon.
pokeballs.catch_rate: Variable, increases with the level of the wild Pok√©mon.

pokeballs.name: Master
pokeballs.description: Guarantees the capture of any wild Pok√©mon without fail.

pokeballs.name: Great
pokeballs.description: Has a higher catch rate than a regular Pok√© Ball.

pokeballs.name: Ultra
pokeballs.description: Has an even higher catch rate than a Great Ball.

pokeballs.name: Dusk
pokeballs.description: More effective in capturing Pok√©mon which are dark types.

pokeballs.name: Quick
pokeballs.description: Has a higher catch rate when used at the beginning of a wild encounter.
pokeballs.catch_rate: 5x on the first turn of battle.

pokeballs.name: Net
pokeballs.description: More effective against Bug-type and Water-type Pok√©mon.

pokeballs.name: Level
pokeballs.description: More effective the higher the level of the player's Pok√©mon compared to the wild Pok√©mon.
pokeballs.catch_rate: Variable, up to 8x if the player's Pok√©mon is at a much higher level.

pokeballs.name: Moon
pokeballs.description: More effective when used on Pok√©mon that can evolve using moon stone.
pokeballs.catch_rate: 4x if used on Pok√©mon that are fairy type.

pokeballs.name: Heavy
pokeballs.catch_rate: Variable, up to 8x for very heavy Pok√©mon.

pokeballs.name: Fast
pokeballs.catch_rate: 4x against Pok√©mon with a base Speed of 100 or more.

pokeballs.name: Sport
pokeballs.description: A special Pok√© Ball used to catch Bug type Pok√©mons.

items.name: Vitamin
items.description: Increases the Effort values(ev) of a particular stat by +10

items.name: Boost
items.description: Increases the Individual values(iv) of a particular stat by +1. Note: It is can be only used once per stat

items.name: Berry
items.description: Decreases the Effort values(ev) of a particular stat by -10

items.name: Ring
items.description: Allows your Pok√©mon to mega evolve during a battle. Note: You must have the corresponding mega stone of that Pok√©mon to mega evolve
